title: Bubble Sort Algorithm in JavaScript
description: In this lab, we will be working on a JavaScript programming exercise that focuses on sorting arrays using the bubble sort algorithm. The purpose of this lab is to help you understand how the bubble sort algorithm works, as well as to give you an opportunity to practice your JavaScript programming skills. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to implement the bubble sort algorithm in JavaScript, and how to use it to sort arrays of numbers.

meta.title: JavaScript Bubble Sort Algorithm | Programming Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to implement the bubble sort algorithm in JavaScript and practice your coding skills with this comprehensive programming tutorial.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, Bubble Sort, Sorting Algorithm, Programming, Coding, Tutorial

verify.name: Verify Node Commands Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: JavaScript 中的冒泡排序算法
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将进行一项 JavaScript 编程练习，重点是使用冒泡排序算法对数组进行排序。本实验的目的是帮助你理解冒泡排序算法的工作原理，并给你一个机会来练习你的 JavaScript 编程技能。在本实验结束时，你将更好地理解如何在 JavaScript 中实现冒泡排序算法，以及如何使用它来对数字数组进行排序。

meta.title: JavaScript 冒泡排序算法 | 编程教程
meta.description: 通过本全面的编程教程，学习如何在 JavaScript 中实现冒泡排序算法并练习你的编码技能。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, 冒泡排序, 排序算法, 编程, 编码, 教程

verify.name: 验证 Node 命令的用法
verify.hint: 在终端/SSH 中，通过输入 'node' 并按下回车键即可运行 JavaScript。
